artist: Designer: George Macy; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: full blue linen, gold-stamped lettering and designs; endpapers: white laid; slip case: gold paper over cardboard, paper label printed in blue and white affixed (two cases); edges dyed (?) blue; initials/numerals color-printed; type: Monotype Bell; 2,646 pp., 5 vols.
title: The Holy Bible: The King James Version
